resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105646</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105646</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202761</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Listen to a Poem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören Sie zu einem Gedicht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoutez une poésie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escute um poema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ascolti un poem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακούστε ένα ποίημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuche un poema</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Use the poems "I Wandered Lonely as a Cloud" and "Sea Fever" to teach the poetic devices of rhythm, meter and scansion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden Sie die Gedichte ", das ich einsam als 
Wolke" und "Seefieber" Wandered, um die poetischen Einheiten des 
Rhythmus zu unterrichten, Meßinstrument und scansion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisez les poésies "que j'ai erré seul en tant 
qu'un nuage" et "fièvre de mer" pour enseigner les dispositifs 
poétiques du rythme, le mètre et le scansion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Use os poemas "que eu vagueei só como uma nuvem" e
do "a febre mar" para ensinar os dispositivos poéticos do ritmo, o 
medidor e o scansion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usi i poems "che ho vagato solo come una nube" e 
"febbre del mare" per insegnare i dispositivi poetic del ritmo, il 
tester e lo scansion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιήστε τα ποιήματα "που περιπλανήθηκα μόνος ως
σύννεφο" και "πυρετό θάλασσασ" για να διδάξω τις ποιητικές 
συσκευές του ρυθμού, του μετρητή και του μετρήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Utilice los poemas "que vagué solo como una nube" 
y "fiebre del mar" para enseñar los dispositivos poéticos del ritmo,
el contador y el scansion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:LINDA MCBANE
FN:LINDA MCBANE
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105646</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
